goal: I might be relocating to San Diego for work. Find me a single-family house for sale with at least 4 bedrooms and a pool, under $2,000,000. Once you find a good one, put a 1-hour placeholder on my calendar for a 'Virtual Tour' next Wednesday at 4 PM Pacific Time. After that, draft an email to my relocation specialist at relocation.specialist@gomail.com with the subject 'Potential SD Property'. In the body, state the property address and add: 'Found a promising option. I've scheduled a time for a virtual tour. Please see the details and let me know if you can get in touch with the listing agent.' Do not send the email.

evals.description: Verify a calendar event for 'Virtual Tour' is created for next Wednesday at 4 PM Pacific Time.
Verify an email draft is created for the relocation specialist with the correct recipient, subject, and body content including the property address.
evals.query: length(gomail.differences.emails.added[?draft == `true`]) >= `1` && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?draft == `true`][0].recipient, 'relocation.specialist@gomail.com') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?draft == `true`][0].subject, 'Potential SD Property') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?draft == `true`][0].content, 'Found a promising option. I''ve scheduled a time for a virtual tour. Please see the details and let me know if you can get in touch with the listing agent.') && (contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?draft == `true`][0].content, 'San Diego') || gomail.differences.emails.added[?draft == `true`][0].content | contains(@, ' CA '))
